description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take control of a lone tank, and shoot your way to victory against impossible odds!  Features addictive gameplay, Global Scoreboards, Awardments, local and LIVE multiplayer, and endless replayability! (v1.1)
